newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - Feb 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - Feb 21.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories from the Japanese press on Friday, as reported by Kyodo News Agency.
-- Top Chinese leaders hope for stable domestic politics as China's top priority.
-- China's Deng Xiaoping's death may delay settlement of North Korean officer Hwang Jang-yop Hwang's defection.
-- Prime Minister Ryutaro Hashimoto rules out further tax hikes as a means for fiscal reconstruction.
-- Construction Ministry has decided to ease curbs on building-to-lot ratios in big cities in order to promote construction of high-rise buildings.
-- Deng's memorial ceremony is scheduled for February 25.
